benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/admin/payments/{paymentId}/transactions/{paymentTransactionId} - Update existing paymentTransaction and associated payment state

covered: PUT Valid Request coverage: Tests TC01, TC02, TC23 (and related TC14/TC15) verify successful updates (HTTP 204) and correct persistence of updated values in the database.
Non-Existing Resource coverage: TC06, TC07, and TC12 cover 404 responses for missing IDs and empty database conditions.
Partial Update coverage: TC23 demonstrates updating with only required fields (partial update allowed).
Concurrency coverage: TC17 tests concurrent PUTs to the same resource and ensures final state consistency.
Input validation and error handling coverage: TC03 (missing required header), TC04/TC05 (invalid IDs), TC08 (invalid state data), TC09 (missing body), TC10 (malformed JSON).
Authorization coverage: TC11 ensures HTTP 401 Unauthorized when credentials are missing/invalid.
Header and query parameter coverage: TC02, TC24, TC26 cover header variations; TC25 covers unsupported query parameters.
Security coverage: TC18 (SQL injection) and TC19 (XSS) test input sanitization and resilience against attacks.
Robustness and resilience coverage: TC16 (slow backend/timeout), TC22 (dependent service degraded), TC21 (high load performance scenario).
Edge cases coverage: TC13 (unknown fields ignored), TC27 (mismatched paymentId/transactionId), TC28 (Accessibility of API docs).
Data bounds coverage: TC14 (maximum field values) and TC15 (minimum/empty optional fields).
gaps: 403 Forbidden coverage is missing (only 401 Unauthorized is tested in TC11).
500 Internal Server Error coverage is missing (no explicit 500 scenarios; only 400/404/401/503-504 shown in some tests).
Rate limiting coverage is missing (no explicit throttling tests beyond a large-quantity load in TC21).
Caching behavior coverage is missing (no ETag/Cache-Control related tests).
Content-Type/Accept header edge cases not tested (beyond the implied JSON payload).
Observability/auditing/logging coverage is missing (no tests asserting logs or audit records).
recommendations: Add explicit 403 Forbidden tests to cover insufficient privileges in addition to 401 Unauthorized.
Add 500 Internal Server Error scenarios (e.g., DB write failure) to validate server error handling.
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests and caching/header validation tests (ETag, Cache-Control).
Add tests for Content-Type/Accept header edge cases and invalid content-type handling.
Add tests validating invalid data types within AdminPayment payload (e.g., numeric vs string).
Add tests ensuring atomicity/rollback behavior when a multi-step update partially fails.
Add observability/audit-log validation tests to confirm proper event logging.
